Terms of Use EnterHealth (following call “Eh” or “we”) provide to read and write blood pressure, heart rate, etc. health record from Apple.Inc Health app. (following call “Health app”) All that data will store in Health app When you delete record in Eh, we will backup that record in local to make sure you can restore it any time. If you don’t want to restore this record you can delete permanently.
